casebody.data:
LA JOLLA DEVELOPMENT GROUP LLC, Appellant/Cross-Respondent,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., a National Banking Association, Respondent/Cross-Appellant,
and
Terrasini Unit Owners Association; and Absolute Collection Services, LLC, Respondents/Cross-Respondents. No. 74882 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 25, 2019

AFFIRMED. DISMISSED.
